Recommendations.Title: Solar Together – Domestic Planning Guidance
Key Strengths: Offers guidance for obtaining planning permission and building regulations approval for solar panel installations.
Provides information on designation, planning permission requirements, permitted development conditions.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource offers specific guidance for residents looking to install solar panels on their properties in Southampton. It is directly related to the question and provides both planning permission and building regulations information, including details about permitted development conditions.

Recommendations.Title: Solar Panels and Conservation Areas
Key Strengths: Offers information about solar panel installations in conservation areas.
Provides details on when planning permission is required.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource offers detailed insights into solar panel installations in Southampton's Conservation Areas, with specific information about when planning permission will be required. This directly addresses the question regarding council customer information needs about solar panelling.

Recommendations.Title: Solar Together Hampshire - buying solar panels and battery storage ...
Key Strengths: Explains that solar PV installations are generally considered permitted development and do not require planning permission.
Offers information on Solar Together Hampshire program.
Recommendations.Reasoning: This resource provides useful information for residents who wish to learn about permits required to install solar systems, along with offering information about the Solar Together Hampshire program which could potentially help residents save costs on installation and maintenance.

Recommendations.Title: View planning and building control applications and decisions
Key Strengths: Provides access to various planning and building control applications and decisions.
Offers older decision notices as well, some of which are scanned for visibility.
Recommendations.Reasoning: While this resource does not directly address the question on solar panel permissions and guidelines, it provides a valuable platform where individuals can view planning and building control decisions. This could serve as a useful reference in understanding previous permits related to solar panels.

Recommendations.Title: Portswood Residents' Gardens conservation area
Key Strengths: Provides information about the Portswood Residents' Gardens conservation area.
Explains planning permission requirements for the erection of solar panels within conservation areas.
Recommendations.Reasoning: While this resource discusses guidelines for conservation areas rather than explicitly covering solar panels, it offers valuable insights into the specific permits required to install solar panels in such areas. This could prove useful to residents living within the Portswood Residents' Gardens conservation area.

raw_result.Analysis Notes: This analysis is based on providing information relevant to council customer needs regarding solar panel installation permissions, guidelines, and resources for checking approved applications or decisions in Southampton. The provided links were examined for their suitability and relevance, and the top 5 recommendations are presented below.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The order of recommendations is based on the perceived relevance to the customer's information needs, with higher-ranked resources being more directly related to the question. All of the provided links offer valuable information that could help residents navigate the solar panel permission process in Southampton.
